title: LOST.The.Miniseries.Fanedit.2012.Part.1.Across.the.Sea.720p.x264
description:
So I found this on usenet and freakin loved it. Wanted to share it here for those that were disappointed with season 6 of LOST and would like to see this fanedit that makes the ending totally different. This is the FIRST of FOUR parts and if I see an interest in this I will post the next ones:)

Here's the original release info:

Fanedit Name: LOST: The Miniseries - Part 1: Across The Sea
Faneditor Name: DriggyDriggs
Tagline: A more satisfying ending to one of the best television shows of all
time.
Original Movie Title: LOST (TV Series)
Genre: Science Fiction

Available in HD? Yes

Brief Synopsis:
In this 4-Part fan edit of LOSTÃƒâ€ s final season, we discover what happens to the
survivors of Oceanic 815 after they detonated the hydrogen bomb 30 years in the
past in order to change the future. This fan edit ends with a much different
outcome than the series did.

Intention:
This miniseries is meant to be watched after the first five seasons of LOST. I
wanted to give LOST fans like myself a better ending to the show.

This is the final version of this edit.

Like most avid LOST fans, I was disappointed by Season 6, not only because they
wasted so much time throughout the season, but because the entire ÃƒÂ´flash-
sidewaysÃƒÂ¶ world was a red-herring. We werenÃƒâ€ t flashing into an alternate
universe at all, but rather a time many years in the future where all the
characters were dead and trying to find each other in an elaborate purgatory
they had created for themselves.

This show had always been about 2 things: the people and the island. I donÃƒâ€ t
know about you, but I really donÃƒâ€ t care what happens to the characters when they
die. Well, with this version, you wonÃƒâ€ t have to either. Inspired by the Prison
Break trilogy on the main site, this version completely removes the afterlife
flashes from season six and turns it into a miniseries divided into 2-hour
parts.

Cuts and Additions:

This one is a combination of the episodes "LAX" parts 1 and 2, "What Kate Does"
and "Across the Sea" with no ÃƒÂ´flash-sidewaysÃƒÂ¶. Also, flashbacks tell the details
of Jacob and the MiBÃƒâ€ s past. A few other trims were made here and there, but the

- Added the scene from the Season 5 finale to the beginning with ÃƒÂ´FlockeÃƒÂ¶

- Cut a scene of Jack and Kate sharing a moment before she goes to look for

- Cut Hurley and Miles over SayidÃƒâ€ s body saying goodbye.

beach is spread out in this part. Rearranging some scenes also required the

- Cut out all of the spots where it went to black on the commercial breaks.
